Reviews.Title: Love my Samsung Nx1000
Reviews.Author: Amanda Ricketts
Reviews.Content: Love Love my Samasung Nx1000 Couldn't have asked for a better product. Syncs awesome with my facebook and dropbox. Would like to see a faster processor though.

Reviews.Title: wrong memory card supplied
Reviews.Author: Georgi Zhelev
Reviews.Content: The item was advertised to include 8GB SD card, instead it came with 16GB MicroSD card which required a trip to Bestbuy to get a MicroSD adapter.

ProductInfo.Features:
20.3 Mp Image Capture
20-50mm (2.5x) Zoom Lens
Bright 3.0" TFT-LCD
Large (23.5 x 15.7mm) APS-C Image Sensor
Full HD 1080p Stereo Video Capture
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NX1000 Mirrorless Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 20-50mm Lens (Black) Kit. Includes 8GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Extedned Life Replacement Battery, Tripod, Case & More
